title: appa murugaiyanE
sahitya:
appA murugayyanE eppOdu aruLvadu enakku appa paripUrNa krpai prabhO sheppAi en



anupallavi



appanE nin mIdu aDiyEn sheppum ishai tamizh ulagu oppavE shruti layam tappAmal
pADiDum nayam nAnura



caraNam



ettanaiyO pApam sheidEn attanaiyum nashikkavum en tiru manaiyil pon minnAL
ennALum vashikkavum
uttama kavi kunjaradAsan ennul rucikkavum oLir divyamaniyE OyAdunai nAn
bhajikkavum
